name: Root/Leaf
title: R/L
definition: Indicates that the UNI is either a root or a leaf in a rooted multipoint EVC.
usageNotes: Required for a rooted multipoint EVC as designated by the NC Code when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N”.
Optional for rooted multipoint EVC as designated by the NC Code when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “C”, “D”, or “R”.
fieldNotes: At least one UNI must be designated as a Root.
More than one Root is allowed per EVC.
